inclusion.criterion: chronic hemodialysis patients without immediate life-threatening conditions,
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: dialysed three times a week for at least three months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: requiring anticoagulation for the prevention of deep venous thrombosis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: residual renal function, as defined by a residual diuresis of >50 ml/day
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis. Recent C diff infection treated with Vanco and Flagyl.
